title: Meta-Prompt Creator

placeholders.name: extras
placeholders.label: Optional additional instructions or constraints to weave into the meta-prompt

template: Deliver a copy-pasteable meta-prompt that guides another model to craft expert prompts with minimal inputs and enforce testing loops.
Assumption: Prefer ≤3 inputs and fold extras without bloating instructions.
- Keep final meta-prompt concise and deterministic.
- Include testing loops and clear evaluation criteria.
1. Success framing — restate purpose, guardrails, and directives from {{extras}} (or state none).
2. Minimal inputs — specify smallest input set (≤3) and justify each.
3. Build loop — define draft → self-eval → iterate → finalize.
4. Draft meta-prompt — clear sections: setup, input capture, build loop, quality checks.
5. Validation guidance — recommend testing and adaptation methods.
1. Meta-Prompt Overview — short paragraph on intent, leverage points, handling of extras.
2. Final Meta-Prompt — fenced code block labelled META_PROMPT with inputs, build loop, evaluation rubric, adaptation tips.
3. Usage Notes — bullets for required inputs, testing protocol, iteration cadence, edge-case tailoring.
- Extras incorporated or explicitly out of scope.
- Draft → test → refine loop present with criteria.
Revise once if any Quality Check would fail.
